original_text: what he did to the Egyptian army, to its horses and chariots, how he overwhelmed them with the waters of the Red Sea as they were pursuing you, and how the Lord brought lasting ruin on them.
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 애굽 군대와 그 말과 그 병거에 행하신 일 곧 그들이 너희를 뒤쫓을 때에 홍해 물로 그들을 덮어 멸하사 오늘까지 이른 것과

sentences.original_text: what he did to the Egyptian army
with the waters of the Red Sea
and how the Lord brought lasting ruin on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 어떻게 그들에게 영구적인 파멸을 가져왔는지
